Class HostServiceNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.host.controller.HostServiceNotification

  • public class HostServiceNotification
extends java.lang.Object
    Shows an Notification in the Notification-Bar.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Detail

      • stateChanged

        public void stateChanged(ServiceState state)
        Sets different notification content text depending on the new state. If the state is ServiceState.NOT_CONNECTED, the notification will be removed.
        Parameters:
        state - The new state

      • changeNotification

        Parameters:
